Event.name: Motion_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>This frame binds together the various parts of movement, from setting out, to traveling, to arriving.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for the movement is ongoing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the motion occurs.
<ex>The truck <t>moved</t> <fex name="Time">at 10 o'clock</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Area
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Area</fen> is the setting in which the <fen>Theme</fen>'s movement takes place.
<ex>Emily rose to her feet and <t>moved</t> restlessly <fex name="Area">around the room</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Cotheme
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cotheme</fen> is the second moving object, expressed as a direct object or an oblique.
<ex>Pat <t>accompanied</t> <fex name="Cotheme">me</fex> down the street.</ex> <ex>The squirrel <t>chased</t> <fex name="Cotheme">after the nut</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Distance
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Distance</fen> is any expression which characterizes the extent of motion.</def-root>

Arg.name: Goal
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Goal</fen> is the location the <fen>Theme</fen> ends up in.
<ex>The car accelerated and <t>moved</t> <fex name="Goal">into the slow lane</fex>, as he passed.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Path
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Path</fen> refers to (a part of the) ground that the <fen>Theme</fen> travels over or to a landmark the <fen>Theme</fen> travels past.
<ex>The door opened , and he <t>moved</t> <fex name="Path">past Dad</fex>, into the hall.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Source</fen> is the location the <fen>Theme</fen> initially occupies before its change of location.
<ex>The policeman <t>moved</t> <fex name="Source">away from the door</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Speed
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Speed</fen> is the rate at which motion occurs.
<ex>The car <t>moved</t> along <fex name="Spd">at 55 miles per hour</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> is the entity that changes location.
<ex>The explosion made <fex name="Thm">me</fex> <t>move</t> in a hurry.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Mode_of_transportation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Mode_of_transportation</fen> expresses how the motion of the <fen>Theme</fen> is effected, by its body or by a vehicle which holds and conveys the <fen>Theme</fen>. Vehicles can move in any way and in any medium. They are usually expressed obliquely with 'in' or 'by'. </def-root>
